::Hot Rod::

Useing his thrusters, Hot Rod jumps up, and hovors to the side avoiding
most of the fire, but two laser struck his legs.
"Oh hell, now I'm pissed."
He rockets at D-13. When close enough, Hot Rod sends a powerful uppercut
at D-13.
